Package org.adl.samplerte.client

Class Summary
ClientRTS Filename:ClientRTS

Description:
This class implements the ADL Sharable Content Object Reference Model (SCORM) Version 2004 Sharable Content Object (SCO) to Learning Management System (LMS) communication API defined by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE).
ServletProxy Filename: ServletProxy

Description:
This class encapsulates communication between the API Adapter applet and the LMSCMIServlet.
